comment.text: This translation key is used to display a success message when an application is enabled successfully in the OAuth store. It appears as a toast notification in the UI and indicates that the application has been enabled after clicking a button or similar action. The message is displayed if multiple applications are being enabled at once, otherwise, it displays a singular "Application enabled successfully" message.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "애플리케이션이 활성화되었습니다" is a literal translation of 'Applications enabled successfully'. While technically correct, it sounds slightly formal and less natural in Korean. A more common and natural phrasing would be "애플리케이션 활성화에 성공했습니다" or "애플리케이션 활성화 완료되었습니다".

The Romanian translation "Aplicații au fost activate cu succes" is grammatically correct, but slightly passive. A more natural phrasing would be 'Aplicațiile au fost activate cu succes' or 'Aplicațiile s-au activat cu succes'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aplicațiile au fost activate cu succes

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'යෙදුම් සාර්ථකව ක්‍රියාත්මක කරන ලදී' while conveying a similar meaning, isn't the most natural or common phrasing for 'Applications enabled successfully' in Sinhala. A more accurate and idiomatic translation would emphasize the completion of the enabling process.

While "Застосунки" can mean 'applications,' it carries a more informal, almost playful tone. 'Програми' (programy) or 'Додатки' (dodatky) would be more appropriate for a formal context like OAuth settings.
The word 'активовано' is spelled correctly but, depending on the desired level of formality, 'активовані' might be slightly better.

The translation '多个应用已启用' (Duō gè yìngyòng yǐ qǐyòng) literally translates to 'Multiple applications have been enabled'. While technically correct, it's not as concise or natural as a direct equivalent of 'Applications enabled successfully'.  A more accurate translation might emphasize the successful completion of the action.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 应用启用成功 (Yìngyòng qǐyòng chénggōng)
